main event: On January 22, 1956, a ground-visual observation of a round small bluish white object with a tail like a comet was reported near Miami, Florida.
interesting points: The object was observed moving from SW to NE,The sighting was reported quickly and did not last long,Similar sightings were reported from St. Petersburg and Lakeland, Florida, indicating a wider area of observation, The object was described as small, comparable to a dime held at arm's length, and it had a small tail.
sighted object: one round small bluish white object with a tail
witness description: a civilian and a flight engineer from an airline
